SENT.plain: The percentage of employment in the Marfan patient after the Bentall procedure was studied
Eighteen of 20 patients (90%) returned to their daily life and are working well after the surgery
Seven patients (35%) needed the second operation due to the enlargement of false lumen during the follow-up period
Fatal cardiovascular accidents occurred in 7 their families (35%) in our series

Careful follow-up, adequate selection of medical and surgical treatment including second operation, medical examination of their families are important to keep the good quality of life in the Marfan patient
